mapper.select: select * from feed where is_hide = false and is_delete = false ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
select * from feed where is_hide = false and is_delete = false and feed_id <= #{feedId} ORDER BY feed_id DESC LIMIT 10;
select * from feed where feed_id = #{feedId} and is_hide = false and is_delete = false;
mapper.insert: insert into feed (user_id,title,content,is_hide,is_delete,created_at,modified_at) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isHide}, false, now(), now())
mapper.update: update feed set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_hide = #{isHide}, modified_at = now() where feed_id = #{feedId}
update feed set is_delete = true where feed_id = #{feedId}
